name: 3D Gangster City Traffic Crime Gun Racing
name_original: 3D Gangster City Traffic Crime Gun Racing
description: Cruise the open city car driving game for guns! Awesome fast and furious cars to choose. Collect the guns before time runs out. Kinda a parking game like feel but instead of finding the parking spot you must gather the guns for the gang city in the given time period. Super fun and intense game. If you enjoy drifting games, Drift max, Drift away, or just car driving games in general were sure you will have fun with this game, the car simulator of choice.
